Task 4

```{r}
A = matrix(c(2,4,0,7,6,8,3,1,4), 3, 3, byrow = TRUE)
B = matrix(c(1,0,2,-1,-1,0,4,0,1), 3, 3, byrow = TRUE)

A
B
```

```{r}
AB = A%*%B
BtA = t(B)%*%A

AB
BtA
```

```{r}
detA = det(A)
rB = rankMatrix(B)

detA
rB
```
